overview: Kristen's stepfather confronts her about taking the car without permission. Melissa tries to go to school without panties on, but her stepdad catches her and sends her upstairs. When Ashlee's stepdad realizes that Ashlee and Joseline want to be together, he encourages them to grope each other's tits while kissing. Kristen stepdad learns that she's wearing perfume to impress a boy. The he discovers that she's not even wearing panties!
tagline: Bad girls get punished in a real good way!
title: Bad Teens Punished 4
